descript.abstract: Mexico AGEBs with Economic Census Data, 2020 is a polygon theme representing AEGBs (4th level census units) in Mexico as of 2020. Attribute data include summary results of the 2020 Mexican census questions regarding economic variables. The documentation of these variables can be found in the "Economic" section from the accompanying code book. This dataset is part of Mexico 2020 Census collection.

citeinfo.title: Mexico AGEBs with Economic Census Data, 2020

enttyp.enttypd: File Geodatabase representing census sectors and associated attribute tables.
